text: Mark Watson (born 1980) is an English stand-up comedian and novelist. Mark Watson may also refer to: *Mark Watson (baseball) (born 1974), American former Major League Baseball pitcher *Mark Watson (Canadian soccer) (born 1970), Canadian soccer player *Mark Watson (English footballer) (born 1973), retired English football forward *Mark Watson (Australian footballer) (born 1960), Australian rules footballer and coach, winner of the 1987 Sandover Medal *Mark Watson (sculptor) (born 1949), American sculptor *Mark Watson (economist) (born 1952), professor of econometrics at Princeton University *Mark Watson (military officer), Commodore, Royal Canadian Navy, Director General of Morale and Welfare Services *Mark E. Watson III (born 1964), American entrepreneur *Mark Watson (archaeologist) (1906–1979), British diplomat and archaeologist *Mark Watson-Gandy (born 1967), British barrister, UK law professor, author, company chairman, founder of KidsMBA *Mark S. Watson (1887–1966), American editor and correspondent
title: Mark Watson (disambiguation)
